long_description: Explore beautiful Lake Tahoe on two wheels with this guide designed to help you plan your route and minimize your impact. Miskimins, R.W. Softcover; 47 pages; illustrated maps and photos. Fine Edge Productions; copyright 1995. Detailed descriptions for rides include difficulty, distance, starting elevation, lowest and highest elevation and map references. Rides also include directions on how to get to the trailhead and what you can expect on the trail. Ten pavement rides and ten off-road rides.
short_description: Explore beautiful Lake Tahoe on two wheels with this guide designed to help you plan your route and minimize your impact.
